title: Drawing, "Decorative Studies; Verso: Anatomical Studies", 1814–18
medium: Pen and ink over graphite on laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Two studies of partition with grotesque; three friezes with grotesque and masks. Verso: two anatomical studies of knees in profile and frontal views.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Decorative Studies; Verso: Anatomical Studies", 1814–18.
1814–18. Pen and ink over graphite on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2310.
